Automated analize
Instagram Data

Instagram profile public data and to track profile posts' and stories' metadata in order to filter them by hashtags and mentions.

Why you need Hypelitix

Find bloggers and influencers who will reach your target audience.

Find out which bloggers will yield results and who will not bring sales or subscribers.

Don’t waste your budget on inflated blogger accounts with fake followers.

Analyse the quality and growth of instagram followers.

How It works

01.

Add Instagram Accounts

Upload the list of accounts using the administrative panel or via the corresponding API method.

  • Upload by using .xls
  • Support API method
02.

Track User’s Stories, Posts

Track profile posts' and stories' metadata in order to filter them by hashtags and mentions.

  • Instant notification via Webhocks
  • Caching data for 14 days
03.

Get your Result!

Upload the list of accounts using the administrative panel or via the corresponding API method.

  • Upload by using .xls
  • Support API method
